name: Beach Buggy Racing
overview: Drive into an action-packed, surprise-filled world of off-road kart racing mayhem. Race against a field of rival drivers, each with unique personalities and special abilities. Build a collection of crazy power-ups, like Dodgeball Frenzy, Fireball, and Oil Slick. Unlock and upgrade a variety of cars, from dune buggies to monster trucks. Test your skills in six different game modes on 15 imaginative 3D race tracks, against a pack of tropical-loving rivals with a serious case of road rage! Fast, furious, and fun, Beach Buggy Racing is a kart racing island adventure for all ages.
